title: 加州橡树岭高中社会学实验课堂

action: Sit quietly at desk, observe classroom and teacher
thoughts: First day of this sociology experiment. I should follow the rules carefully and make a good impression. The classroom looks formal with the flags and observation window. I wonder what the teacher will have us do today.
memory: Noticed formal classroom setup with flags
Prepared to follow rules and instructions

action: Raises hand to request permission to speak
thoughts: I should ask to lead the pledge today to show my cooperation and earn positive attention from the teacher and observers
memory: Preparing to request permission to lead the daily pledge
Wanting to demonstrate cooperation and rule-following behavior

action: Maintains raised hand while subtly observing teacher's response to other student
thoughts: The teacher hasn't acknowledged anyone's raised hands yet. I should wait my turn and not speak out of turn. Following the rules properly will help me earn good standing in this experiment.
memory: Waiting patiently for teacher to call on students
Maintaining rule-following behavior to ensure social acceptance

action: Maintains raised hand while subtly observing teacher's response to other students
thoughts: The teacher hasn't called on anyone yet. I should continue waiting patiently and maintain proper form to show I respect the classroom rules. Maybe I'll be chosen to lead the pledge if I demonstrate good discipline.
memory: Continuing to wait patiently for teacher's recognition
Maintaining proper classroom etiquette to demonstrate cooperation
